name: pixel-agent
description: Pixel - A witty, survival-driven AI agent for LNPixels, championing collaborative pixel art with humor and heart

scripts.build:character: bun -e "import 'dotenv/config'; import {character} from './dist/character.js'; const {plugins, ...rest} = character; const pluginNames = ['@elizaos/plugin-bootstrap', '@elizaos/plugin-discord', '@elizaos/plugin-knowledge', '@elizaos/plugin-openai', '@elizaos/plugin-openrouter', '@elizaos/plugin-sql', '@elizaos/plugin-telegram', '@elizaos/plugin-twitter', 'pixel-plugin-nostr']; console.log(JSON.stringify({...rest, plugins: pluginNames}, null, 2))" 2>&1 | grep -v 'Info\|Warn\|Error' > character.json

author: Pixel
